header.title: GoodLabs – good
header.text1: Витамины для надежной основы вашего здоровья
header.text2: Основа здоровья человека – достаточное количество витаминов и минералов в организме. Продукты GoodLabs созданы, чтобы укрепить эту основу и помочь вам жить полноценной жизнью
header.item_desc_1: Для подбора компонентов и их соотношения используем передовые исследования ученых.
header.item_desc_2: Линейка продуктов GoodLabs максимально отвечает основным потребностям организма человека.
header.item_desc_3: Наш опыт разработки товаров для здоровья 7 лет. В GoodLabs мы собрали лучшие наработки и специалистов.
header.item_desc_4: Производства GoodLabs имеют сертификаты GMP, НАССР, ISO, чтобы обеспечить наши высокие стандарты качества.

formula.title: GoodLabs – немецкое качество составов и производства
formula.desc: Наша гордость – это формулы составов наших продуктов и современные производственные площадки Германии. Каждый наш товар создан профессионалами с многолетним опытом на основе передовых исследований ученых в области нутрициологии. Формулы составов продуктов Goodlabs максимально эффективно удовлетворяет потребность человека в вопросах здоровья.

products.title: Для чего были созданы продукты GoodLabs
products.desc: Мы знаем, как тяжело найти хороший продукт для здоровья. Многим приходится пробовать, ошибаться и снова пробовать. Витамины GoodLabs созданы для того, чтобы вы не ошибались. Благодаря нашим умным формулам составов продуктов и ассортименту возможно решить большинство основных потребностей в вопросах здоровья.

header.title: GoodLabs for a strong foundation for your health
header.desc: Our mission is to enable every person to live a quality life. We know that with the right supplements it is possible to prevent many health problems, live a full, happy life, and make your body the main assistant in achieving your goals.

family.title: The families of our employees use GoodLabs, too
family.text_1: We created this line of products as for our families. To do this, we combined the experience of the best specialists, modern scientific practices and advanced production sites. We managed to create a line of products meeting to the fullest the needs of a modern family in matters of health.
family.text_2: Vitamins and minerals from GoodLabs are included in the diet of our employees' families.

promo.title: Immunal
promo.item_2: Strengthens the body's defenses against viruses and bacteria
promo.item_4: Contains powerful natural immunomodulators beta-glucan and elderberry extract and a complex of vital vitamins and minerals

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: One of the most valuable medicinal plants in the world due to the content of phenolic acids. These compounds are powerful antioxidants that can help reduce damage to the body from oxidative stress by stimulating the immune system.

Promote healthy immune function and reduce oxidative stress. They are effective in the fight against colds and viral diseases, inhibit the growth and reproduction of pathogenic microorganisms, relieve inflammation.

Stimulates the functions of the immune system: helps to reduce the risk of infectious diseases (viral, bacterial and parasitic origin). And as an antioxidant, it stimulates cells to bind oxygen radicals, which can prevent autoimmune diseases.

Histidine is an essential amino acid that is also a precursor to several hormones as well as a precursor to a compound known as histamine. It activates immune responses, increases the rate of maturation of immune cells, increases their activity and significantly increases their lifespan.

ingredientArray2.text: One of the main reasons for the lowering of immunity is excessive stress. B vitamins support the nervous system and take care of the health and beauty of the skin and hair.

Vitamin D directly affects the immune system, increasing its protective functions, in addition, without this substance, it is impossible to assimilate calcium in the body. It is especially important to get adequate amounts of vitamin D during cloudy seasons, as sun exposure is the main source of vitamin D.

Vitamin A takes care of vision by supporting the normal functioning of the retina. Vitamin A also promotes cell growth, playing an important role in the normal functioning of the heart, lungs, kidneys and other organs.
Selenium is an essential element in antioxidant protection. It is this mineral that protects the body from harmful oxidants, prevents cell damage and infections.

advantages.title: GoodLabs Immunal is a proven support for your immunity
advantages.desc: In the modern world, it is very difficult for a person to monitor nutrition and lead a healthy lifestyle in order to maintain strong immunity. But there is a solution. GoodLabs Immunal with beta-glucan is a vitamin and mineral complex with scientifically proven action of components to maintain the strength of the immunity.
advantages.text: β-glucan is a potent inducer of epigenetic and functional reprogramming of cells of innate immunity, a process called "trained immunity", which leads to an increased response to secondary infections.

feedback.text: Immunity is an important system of the human body that needs your support. GoodLabs Immunal is a reliable remedy for strong immunity with dosages that will not harm the body.

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.text_1: Take 1 capsule daily with water with or after food.
technical.text_2: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. A food supplement is not intended to substitute for a healthy diet. Do not use the product in case o individual intolerance to the ingredients.
technical.text_3: Store in the original packaging in a dark dry place. Do not store above 25 °C.

faq.title: Good to know
faq.desc: If you didn't find the answer to your question, feel free to write to us

questionArray.ttl: What is the uniqueness of the IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex?
questionArray.text: The IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex is created considering all the nutritional needs of the immune system of a human living in the modern world. The product naturally stimulates the immune system and serves as the prevention of many diseases.

questionArray.ttl: Is IMMUNAL safe to take without a doctor's prescription?
questionArray.text: A doctor's prescription is optional, but it is worth consulting with a specialist when taking other supplements or medications.

questionArray.ttl: Are there any contraindications for administration?
questionArray.text: A contraindication is individual intolerance to the components.
Take once a day with water or during / after meals.

questionArray.ttl: What is the course of administration?
questionArray.text: The course of administration is determined in accordance with the individual needs of your body.

questionArray.ttl: How to know if “Immune complex” TM GoodLabs is right for me?
questionArray.text: If your goal is to strengthen your immune system, then IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs will be the ideal assistant on the way to it.

questionArray.ttl: Aren`t dosages of the product too large?
questionArray.text: For the regulation of consumed substances, there are norms of physiological needs. They are individual for different countries. However, there are basic consumption levels that all countries are guided by.

questionArray.ttl: Can IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs complex be taken for prophylaxis during illnesses high season?
questionArray.text: Of course, the vitamin complex IMMUNAL TM GoodLabs is designed to constantly support human immunity, including during the high season of colds.

promo.title: Multi Vitamin
promo.item_1: Contains over 20 vital vitamins and minerals
promo.item_2: The optimal amount of active ingredients for daily use
promo.item_3: Fortified with antioxidant vitamins (such as C, A and E)
promo.item_4: Helps maintain high physical and mental activity

ingredients.title: High quality ingredients for your immunity needs

ingredientArray1.text: Vitamin B3 is involved in the synthesis of hormones, and they in turn affect our well-being and vitality. It also stimulates enzymes and gastric juice involved in digestion, which results in the saturation of the body with energy and nutrients.
Along with other B vitamins, vitamin B12 helps convert food into energy. It also helps prevent a type of anemia that can make you weak and tired.

Promotes rapid recovery in case of strength loss, protects against increased fatigability. This element participates in the transmission of nerve impulses and in the contraction and relaxation of muscles, which is important for the cardiovascular system functioning.

Vitamin C is most often used to strengthen immunity, but it also has a positive effect on our well-being and energy levels. It is required for the synthesis of L-Carnitine, which helps the body burn fat for energy.

ingredientArray2.text: Vitamin C helps stimulate the production of white blood cells, known as lymphocytes and phagocytes, which help protect the body from infection.

Vitamin D enhances the anti-pathogens effect of monocytes and macrophages, white blood cells that are an important part of the immune defense, and reduces inflammation, which improves an immune response.

Zinc is essential for the development and communication of immune cells and plays an important role in the inflammatory response. A deficiency in this nutrient leads to an increased risk of infections and diseases, including pneumonia.
B vitamins, including B12 and B6, have anti-inflammatory effect and influence the production of melatonin, which in turn improves the immune response.

ingredientArray3.text: Magnesium helps regulate neurotransmitters that send signals throughout the brain and nervous system. It plays a critical role in brain function and mood, and low levels are associated with an increased risk of depression.

Manganese is essential for healthy brain function and is often used to treat certain nervous disorders. It speeds up the conduction of electrical impulses through the body, which in turn affects the speed of the brain's reaction.
Getting enough vitamin B12 can improve memory and make learning easier. It has also been shown to help improve mood and reduce symptoms of depression and low mood.

Zinc is important for the areas of the brain responsible for concentration and memory. With a lack of zinc, the cerebral cortex begins to malfunction, which can be expressed in hallucinations, epileptic seizures, impaired sense of smell and loss of taste.

ingredientArray4.text: Inositol can help balance important brain chemicals, including those thought to affect mood, such as serotonin and dopamine.

Folic acid, or vitamin B9, is also involved in the synthesis of serotonin. It also regulates the fission and growth of all cells in the body, including nerve cells, which, as we now know, are able to restore.
Vitamin B6 is necessary for the synthesis of gamma-aminobutyric acid, the most important "calming" substance in the central nervous system, as well as serotonin, the "hormone of happiness".

Magnesium is especially important among the microelements for the central nervous system. It regulates the process of conducting a nerve impulse, and therefore, is necessary for adequate sleep and maintaining a stable psycho-emotional state.

ingredientArray5.text: Lack of vitamin D3 affects the body's ability to regulate cyclic rhythms. When the body's clock is not working properly, it is unable to transmit signals to sleep hormones that are involved in falling asleep.
Vitamin E deficiency has been linked to restless legs syndrome, which can greatly affect sleep quality. Vitamin E helps you fall asleep faster and prevents sleep interruption during the night.
B vitamins are essential for the proper functioning of the adrenal glands and thus help prevent the release of adrenaline at night when not needed.
Iron deficiency is also thought to be the main cause of restless legs symptom, which in turn causes insomnia and anxiety disorders that make it difficult to fall asleep.

ingredientArray6.text: Biotin promotes good skin health and is essential for the production of keratin, a protein that helps strengthen nails and hair. It is biotin that is one of the main elements that promotes the growth of healthy and thick hair.
Vitamin C acts as an antioxidant in the body, helping to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, thereby slowing down aging.

It is responsible for the firmness, elasticity and hydration of the skin and hair. This natural antioxidant, as well as vitamin C, helps the body to prolong youth and has a positive effect on the endocrine profile, which directly affects the condition of our skin.
Vitamin A plays a very important role in the process of skin cell renewal, and also stimulates the functioning of fibroblasts, cells associated with the production of collagen and elastin.

advantages.title: GoodLabs Multivitamin is a strong foundation for your health
advantages.desc: Adequate amounts of vitamins and minerals in the body are foundation for human health and wellness. GoodLabs Multivitamin is a vitamin and mineral complex with the most essential elements for active life.

feedback.text: The vitamin complex GoodLabs Multivitamin has a professionally selected composition and amount of active ingredients, so it maintains the balance of essential vitamins and minerals in the body.

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.text_1: Take 1 capsule daily with water with or after food.
technical.text_2: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. A food supplement is not intended to substitute for a healthy diet. Do not use the product in case o individual intolerance to the ingredients.
technical.text_3: Store in the original packaging in a dark dry place. Do not store above 25 °C.
